version_description:
- Geolocation support for Flex Time users.
- Stability enhancement for Stay Logged In feature

- Improved location support for users whose punch requires a location
- Stability enhancements

- IP Address restriction for Flex Time clients
- Stability enhancements
- Bug fixes

We've enhanced your app experience by integrating Touch ID with the quickest mobile punch on the market! Follow the registration steps after login to start using the fastest Paychex Time app yet.
Note: This is not recommended for shared devices.

- Security enhancements
- Bug Fixes
- Touch ID updates

- Improved experience when a punch result is unknown.
- Performance improvements
- Bug fixes
- Fixes a login issue some Touch ID users were experiencing.

This version of Paychex Time has significant enhancements to location tracking for punches. It will take the app less time to get a more accurate location!

Please note: The app will only request your location if your Employer chooses that setting. If your Employer does not choose a location option for punches, the app will NEVER record your location.

We found a bug with device location and have fixed that!

Please note: The app will only request your location if your Employer chooses that setting. If your Employer does not choose a location option for punches, the app will NEVER record your location.

We now support offline time tracking!

Employees can record their time without a network connection, providing greater accuracy in time management. All punches submitted offline will be saved, and then sent once a network connection has been reestablished.
Minor bug fixes for location permissions

-Improvements to Location accuracy
-Improvements to how we refresh data to better support offline time tracking
-Minor bug fixes

-Added a fix for work detail items being set to 'unassigned' instead of the expected default value
-Added a fix for duplicate actions displaying when the user attempts to clock in, clock out, etc.
-Added a fix to correct the sort order of the actions (punch types)

-Users can now stay logged in for up to 240 hours
-Minor bug fixes
Minor bug fixes
We've introduced a new look and feel to help simplify the way you track time. This includes "one-click punch" and improved messaging throughout the app.
Minor bug fixes

- Enhanced search with better results when switching your organization, job, or labor assignment.
- Updated settings offer more control over your notifications.
- Bug fixes.
Added a fix to correct login crashes on iOS 12.2

-Updated labels for punch actions
-Corrected a map issue occurring on iOS 12.2
-Minor bug fixes

-Increased bottom margin for iPhone X to improve touch points
-Minor bug fixes
New to the Paychex Time app - minor bug fixes and updated analytics monitoring to better troubleshoot unexpected app crashes.
